scripts.prebuild: rimraf dist && cd .. && npm ci && npm run build
scripts.postbuild: move-file dist/tailwindctp-standalone-macos-x64 dist/tailwindctp-macos-x64 && move-file dist/tailwindctp-standalone-macos-arm64 dist/tailwindctp-macos-arm64 && move-file dist/tailwindctp-standalone-win-x64.exe dist/tailwindctp-windows-x64.exe && move-file dist/tailwindctp-standalone-win-arm64.exe dist/tailwindctp-windows-arm64.exe && move-file dist/tailwindctp-standalone-linuxstatic-x64 dist/tailwindctp-linux-x64 && move-file dist/tailwindctp-standalone-linuxstatic-arm64 dist/tailwindctp-linux-arm64 && move-file dist/tailwindctp-standalone-linuxstatic-armv7 dist/tailwindctp-linux-armv7
